languages.text: "И тебе не важно, увидишь ты это своими глазами. Тебе достаточно лишь быть камнем на дороге к этому". {n}Кибелла не спрашивает — она утверждает, глядя на Немезита со странным выражением.{/n}
"And you do not care if you see it with your own eyes. All you strive to be is a pebble on the road." {n}Kibellah does not ask, she proclaims, as she looks at Nemesite with a strange expression.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И тебе не важно, увидишь ты это своими глазами. Тебе достаточно лишь быть камнем на дороге к этому". {n}Кибелла не спрашивает — она утверждает, глядя на Немезита со странным выражением.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "And you do not care if you see it with your own eyes. All you have to do is be a rock on the road." {n}Kibellah does not ask, she proclaims, looking at Nemesite with a strange expression on her face.{/n}

"And you do not care if you see it with your own eyes. All you have to do is be a rock on the road." {n}Kibellah does not ask, she proclaims, looking at Nemesite with a strange expression on her face.{/n}
"And you do not care if you see it with your own eyes. All you have to do is be a pebble on the road." {n}Kibellah does not ask, she proclaims, as she looks at Nemesite with a strange expression.{/n}
"And you do not care if you see it with your own eyes. All you have to do is be a pebble on the road." {n}Kibellah does not ask, she proclaims, as she looks at Nemesite with a strange expression.{/n}
"And you do not care if you see it with your own eyes. All you strive to be is a pebble on the road." {n}Kibellah does not ask, she proclaims, as she looks at Nemesite with a strange expression.{/n}
"And you do not care if you see it with your own eyes. All you strive to be is a pebble on the road." {n}Kibellah does not ask, she proclaims, as she looks at Nemesite with a strange expression.{/n}

languages.text: "Und Euch ist gleichgültig, ob Ihr etwas davon mit eigenen Augen seht. Ihr wollt nur ein Kiesel auf der Straße sein." {n}Kibellah fragt nicht, sie stellt fest, während sie Nemesit mit einem eigenartigen Ausdruck ansieht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And you do not care if you see it with your own eyes. All you strive to be is a pebble on the road." {n}Kibellah does not ask, she proclaims, as she looks at Nemesite with a strange expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und Euch ist gleichgültig, ob Ihr etwas davon mit eigenen Augen seht. Ihr wollt nur ein Kiesel auf der Straße sein." {n}Kibellah fragt nicht, sie stellt fest, während sie Nemesit mit einem eigenartigen Ausdruck ansieht.{/n}

languages.text: «Y no te importa llegar a verlo con tus propios ojos. No aspiras a ser más que una piedra en el camino». {n}Kibellah no pregunta, sino proclama, con la mirada fija en Nemesitio y una expresión extraña.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And you do not care if you see it with your own eyes. All you strive to be is a pebble on the road." {n}Kibellah does not ask, she proclaims, as she looks at Nemesite with a strange expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y no te importa llegar a verlo con tus propios ojos. No aspiras a ser más que una piedra en el camino». {n}Kibellah no pregunta, sino proclama, con la mirada fija en Nemesitio y una expresión extraña.{/n}

languages.text: 「そして、お前はそれを目撃しても気にしない。お前の足掻きは、単なる道ばたの石ころだ」{n}キベラは不思議な表情でネメサイトを見ながら、訊ねるでもなく、宣言した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And you do not care if you see it with your own eyes. All you strive to be is a pebble on the road." {n}Kibellah does not ask, she proclaims, as she looks at Nemesite with a strange expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そして、お前はそれを目撃しても気にしない。お前の足掻きは、単なる道ばたの石ころだ」{n}キベラは不思議な表情でネメサイトを見ながら、訊ねるでもなく、宣言した。{/n}

languages.text: “即便你亲眼看到了，你也并不在意。你努力的一切，不过是为了让自己成为一块挡道的石头。”{n}绮贝菈并没有询问，而是以宣称的语气开了口。她脸上带着古怪的表情，看着涅墨斯特。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And you do not care if you see it with your own eyes. All you strive to be is a pebble on the road." {n}Kibellah does not ask, she proclaims, as she looks at Nemesite with a strange expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “即便你亲眼看到了，你也并不在意。你努力的一切，不过是为了让自己成为一块挡道的石头。”{n}绮贝菈并没有询问，而是以宣称的语气开了口。她脸上带着古怪的表情，看着涅墨斯特。{/n}

languages.text: « Et vous vous moquez de le voir de vos propres yeux. Vous n'aspirez qu'à être un caillou dans la chaussure, » {n}affirme Kibellah d'un ton péremptoire tout en dévisageant étrangement Némésite.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And you do not care if you see it with your own eyes. All you strive to be is a pebble on the road." {n}Kibellah does not ask, she proclaims, as she looks at Nemesite with a strange expression.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Et vous vous moquez de le voir de vos propres yeux. Vous n'aspirez qu'à être un caillou dans la chaussure, » {n}affirme Kibellah d'un ton péremptoire tout en dévisageant étrangement Némésite.{/n}

languages.text: "Bunu kendi gözlerinle görsen de umurunda olmaz. Yegâne uğraşın, bu yolda eşi benzeri bulunmaz birine dönüşmekten ibaret." {n}Kibellah, tuhaf bir ifadeyle Nemezit'e düşüncelerini açığa vuruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And you do not care if you see it with your own eyes. All you strive to be is a pebble on the road." {n}Kibellah does not ask, she proclaims, as she looks at Nemesite with a strange expression.{/n}
